Name: Master Ball
Detail: Catches a wild Pokémon every time.

Name: Ultra Ball
Detail: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 2×

Name: Great Ball
Detail: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 1.5×

Name: Poke Ball
Detail: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.

Name: Safari Ball
Detail: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon in the Great Marsh or Safari Zone.  Success rate is 1.5×

Name: Park Ball
Detail: Catches Pokémon in the Pal Park every time.

Name: Sport Ball
Detail: Tries to catch a Pokémon in the Bug-Catching contest in National Park. (Gen II: Park Ball)
